issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: If the remote HDFS namenode isn't reachable, and an attempt to shut down the JVM is made, the process will keep running
fields.summary: IPC shutdown hangs if remote connection not reachable

resolving as duplicate of HADOOP-10219. Sorry -I needed to rerun the video I was making on filing issues and this was the bug I had to hand
